name: Juggle (BungleBLAST)
description:
Wow check out this blatant rip off of Game and Watch Ball I made. I made as a practice game to get used to Godot 3. Also I'm no good at pixel art but wow check out these hand drawn sprites!

Controls:

Left: Left Arrow/A

Right: Right Arrow/D/'

Up: Up Arrow/W

Down: Down Arrow/D

Accept: Enter

NOTE: When I exported the game Godot it created an executable and a package file that contains all the game assets. The executable does not seem to work if it isn't in the same directory as the package file so make sure these are together
